definitions.definition: A spring of fresh water, surrounded by a fertile region of vegetation , in a desert .
A quiet, peaceful place or situation separated from surrounding noise or bustle.
examples: The park was an oasis in the middle of the busy city.

definitions.definition: A place or situation of fruitfulness or abundance separated from surrounding barrenness or scarcity.

main_definition: A spring of fresh water, surrounded by a fertile region of vegetation , in a desert .
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively ) A quiet, peaceful place or situation separated from surrounding noise or bustle.
( figuratively ) A place or situation of fruitfulness or abundance separated from surrounding barrenness or scarcity.
